General.Name: Suzhou YourBest New-type Materials Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Suzhou YourBest New-type Materials Co. Ltd. operates in the PV industry in China. The company manufactures and sells tin plated ribbons for use in connecting PV module cells for electric conduction. Suzhou YourBest New-type Materials Co. Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Suzhou, China. Suzhou YourBest New-type Materials Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Xinyuan Enterprise Management Co., Ltd.

0.Name: Mr. Feng  Xiao
